details.title: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams . - Eleanor Roosevelt
details.info: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart .

details.title: If life were predictable it would cease to be life and be without flavor . - Eleanor Roosevelt
details.info: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose .

details.title: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated . - Confucius
details.info: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma â€” which is living with the results of other people's thinking .

details.title: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all . - Helen Keller
details.info: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up .

details.title: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood . - Ralph Waldo Emerson
details.info: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated .

details.title: Whoever is happy will make others happy too . - Anne Frank
details.info: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail .

details.title: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough . - Mae West
details.info: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined .
